Uses of Package
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core

  • Packages that use eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core 
    Package Description
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine
    The Flow Engine main classes, the Flow Engine Compiler and the Flow Engine Configuration classes.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api
    The Flow Engine base API interfaces and interaction classes.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core
    Contains the API core classes and interfaces which are somewhat independent.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds
    Contains the ADVANCE datastore API record classes and interfaces.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl
    Default implementations of the Flow Engine API with local and remote options.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.cc
    Independent implementation of the Flow Engine Control Center until the OpenIDE-based version gets finished.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm
    Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.test
    Unit, algorithm and concept testing package.
  • Classes in eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core used by eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine 
    Class and Description
    AdvanceControlException
    The base exception for the ADVANCE Flow Engine Control API.
    BoundedPool
    A bounded object pool.
